properties.SQL select query:
SELECT
    l.l_linenumber,
    l.l_partkey,
    l.l_suppkey,
    l.l_quantity,
    l.l_extendedprice,
    l.l_discount,
    l.l_tax,
    l.l_returnflag,
    l.l_linestatus,
    ld.date_id AS l_shipdate_id,
    lc.date_id AS l_commitdate_id,
    lr.date_id AS l_receiptdate_id,   
    l.l_shipinstruct,
    l.l_shipmode,
    o.o_custkey,
    o.o_orderstatus,
    o.o_totalprice,
    lo.date_id AS o_orderdate_id,
    o.o_orderpriority,
    o.o_clerk,
    o.o_shippriority,
    ps.ps_availqty,
    ps.ps_supplycost
FROM
    lineitem l
    JOIN orders o ON l.l_orderkey = o.o_orderkey
	JOIN partsupp ps ON l.l_partkey = ps.ps_partkey AND l.l_suppkey = ps.ps_suppkey
    JOIN date ld ON l.l_shipdate = ld.d_date
    JOIN date lc ON l.l_commitdate = lc.d_date
    JOIN date lr ON l.l_receiptdate = lr.d_date
    JOIN date lo ON o.o_orderdate = lo.d_date;

SELECT 
    c.c_custkey, 
    c.c_name, 
    c.c_address, 
    c.c_phone, 
    c.c_acctbal,
    n.n_nationkey,
    n.n_name,
    r.r_regionkey,
    r.r_name
FROM customer c
JOIN nation n ON c.c_nationkey = n.n_nationkey
JOIN region r ON n.n_regionkey = r.r_regionkey;

SELECT 
    s.s_suppkey, 
    s.s_name, 
    s.s_address, 
    s.s_phone, 
    s.s_acctbal,
    n.n_nationkey,
    n.n_name,
    r.r_regionkey,
    r.r_name
FROM supplier s
JOIN nation n ON s.s_nationkey = n.n_nationkey
JOIN region r ON n.n_regionkey = r.r_regionkey;

SELECT
    p.p_partkey,
    p.p_name,
    p.p_mfgr,
    p.p_brand,
    p.p_type,
    p.p_size,
    p.p_container,
    p.p_retailprice
FROM
    part p;

INSERT INTO date (d_date)
SELECT DISTINCT date_column
FROM (
    SELECT l_shipdate AS date_column FROM lineitem
    UNION
    SELECT l_commitdate FROM lineitem
    UNION
    SELECT l_receiptdate FROM lineitem
    UNION
    SELECT o_orderdate FROM orders
) AS unique_dates
ORDER BY date_column ASC;

SELECT * FROM date;
